channel.title: Optimisation+
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/qsvymu.png[/img]
Optimisation+ invokes the use of Hyperion by using some parts of its core features: Packet handling, Logging (decoders/encoders/serialization/de-serialization, player updating etc) and so forth. Not only does it use [i]Hyperion[/i] for it's main core features, but it uses some parts of [i]Project Insanity[/i] for user-friendly features: minigames, some skills, event-[i]like[/i] handling and so forth. The main aim of this development, once it's finished, is to [b]kill[/b] Project Insanity and to get people to use this as a base. Yes, you could say it's going to be a scratch framework.
[b][size=12pt]Features:[/size][/b]
[i]Every single class file is @annotated, so people know what everything is. Anyone using Optimisation+ must annotate everything they add, for the purpose of others, yourself and just generally looking clean.[/i]
[ul][li]Logging in.[/li] [li]Rendering.[/li] [li]Ground support.[/li] [li]Player updating.[/li] [li]Object loading.[/li] [li]Object definitions.[/li] [li]NPC loading.[/li] [li]NPC definitions.[/li] [li]Item loading.[/li] [li]Item definitions.[/li] [li]Packet handling.[/li] [li]Appearance.[/li] [li]Player saving, loading and reading.[/li] [li]Packet handling.[/li] [li]Frame loading.[/li] [li]Interface loading.[/li] [li]Netty networking (networked 2,000 bots: no lagg what so ever).[/li] [li]Region system - based off RuneScape's.[/li][/ul]
[b][size=12pt]Content[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Every single consumable type edible (consumable = food).[/li] [li]Pathfinder.[/li] [li]Dream mentor: all the monsters, headicons and reloading.[/li] [li]30 day Membership system(for teh lulz).[/li] [li]Report system: reads, loads and writes.[/li] [li]TO do...[/li][/ul]
[b][size=12pt]Skills[/size][/b]
Haven't written a base for skilling yet, will do it soon.
With just a few packet tweaks (you might be lucky, need to check it myself) Optimisation+ can be used with any client. So noobs :p who love using their 317 client with 602 animations, will be able to use it with [i][b]Optimisation+[/b][/i]. This could be good, it can also be bad.
I know that people like Project Insanity because of how easy it is to add content and how easily it is to roam around the packaging. Optimisation+ can achieve this.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2a4s7ps.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wtd4xx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/xgdiw.png[/img]
[b]Thankful users:[/b]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=22632]Graham.[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=495894]Canownueasy.[/url] blakeman8192 - for the RuneScape's map region system. Jinrake. Anyone else who feels that they want it.

item.title: Optimisation+
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

qsvymu.png728×90

Optimisation+ invokes the use of Hyperion by using some parts of its core features:
Packet handling, Logging (decoders/encoders/serialization/de-serialization, player updating etc) and so forth.
Not only does it use Hyperion for it’s main core features, but it uses some parts of Project Insanity for user-friendly features: minigames, some skills, event-like handling and so forth.
The main aim of this development, once it’s finished, is to kill Project Insanity and to get people to use this as a base.
Yes, you could say it’s going to be a scratch framework.

[size=12pt]Features:[/size]

Every single class file is @annotated, so people know what everything is. Anyone using Optimisation+ must annotate everything they add, for the purpose of others, yourself and just generally looking clean.

[ul][li]Logging in.[/li]
[li]Rendering.[/li]
[li]Ground support.[/li]
[li]Player updating.[/li]
[li]Object loading.[/li]
[li]Object definitions.[/li]
[li]NPC loading.[/li]
[li]NPC definitions.[/li]
[li]Item loading.[/li]
[li]Item definitions.[/li]
[li]Packet handling.[/li]
[li]Appearance.[/li]
[li]Player saving, loading and reading.[/li]
[li]Packet handling.[/li]
[li]Frame loading.[/li]
[li]Interface loading.[/li]
[li]Netty networking (networked 2,000 bots: no lagg what so ever).[/li]
[li]Region system - based off RuneScape’s.[/li][/ul]

[size=12pt]Content[/size]

[ul][li]Every single consumable type edible (consumable = food).[/li]
[li]Pathfinder.[/li]
[li]Dream mentor: all the monsters, headicons and reloading.[/li]
[li]30 day Membership system(for teh lulz).[/li]
[li]Report system: reads, loads and writes.[/li]
[li]TO do…[/li][/ul]

[size=12pt]Skills[/size]

Haven’t written a base for skilling yet, will do it soon.

With just a few packet tweaks (you might be lucky, need to check it myself) Optimisation+ can be used with any client. So noobs who love using their 317 client with 602 animations, will be able to use it with Optimisation+.
This could be good, it can also be bad.

I know that people like Project Insanity because of how easy it is to add content and how easily it is to roam around the packaging. Optimisation+ can achieve this.
